original: tadeva lagnaṃ sudinaṃ tadeva tārābalaṃ candrabalaṃ tadeva |

original: vidyābalaṃ daivabalaṃ tadeva tadeva māsādibalaṃ yathārtham || 164 ||

original: 163 | atra svecchāprāptistu sadguroḥ ityevaṃ pāṭhaḥ samīcīna iti pratibhāti |
